../inc/fillwave/management/LightManager.h

          /*
           * LightManager.h
           *
           * Created on: 18 Apr 2013
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef LIGHTMANAGER_H_
          #define LIGHTMANAGER_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/space/LightDirectional.h>
          #include <fillwave/space/LightPoint.h>
          #include <fillwave/space/LightSpot.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
      35  class Engine;
          namespace manager {
          
          /*! \class LightManager
           *
           * \brief Manager to handle Light objects.
           *
           */
          //#define MAX_TEXTURE_UNITS 32
          
          #define FILLWAVE_MAX_SPOT_LIGHTS 4
          #define FILLWAVE_MAX_POINT_LIGHTS 4
          #define FILLWAVE_MAX_DIRECTIONAL_LIGHTS 4
          
      49  class LightManager {
          public:
      51   LightManager(  GLsizei screenWidth,  
      52   GLsizei screenHeight );
      53   virtual ~LightManager(   );
          
      55   GLboolean isLightsRefresh(   );
      56   void resetLightsRefresh(   );
          
           template <class T>
           GLboolean isRefreshLight(  std::vector<T>& data ) {
           for(  auto it : data ) {
           if (  it->isRefresh(   ) ) {
           return GL_TRUE;
           }
           }
           return GL_FALSE;
           }
          
           template <class T>
      69   void resetRefreshLight(  std::vector<T>& data ) {
           for(  auto it : data ) {
           it->resetRefresh(   );
           }
           }
          
      75   pLightSpot addLightSpot(  pTexture2DRenderable shadowTexture,  
           glm::vec3 position,  
           glm::quat rotation,  
           glm::vec4 color,  
           pEntity entity = pEntity(   ) );
          
      81   pLightPoint addLightPoint(  pTexture3DRenderable shadowTexture,  
           glm::vec3 position,  
           glm::vec4 intensity,  
           pEntity entity );
          
      86   pLightDirectional addLightDirectional(  pTexture2DRenderable shadowTexture,  
           glm::vec3 position,  
           glm::quat rotation,  
           glm::vec4 color,  
           pEntity entity = pEntity(   ) );
          
      92   void removeLight(  pLightSpot light );
      93   void removeLight(  pLightDirectional light );
      94   void removeLight(  pLightPoint light );
      95   void removeLights(   );
          
      97   GLint getLightsSpotHowMany(   );
      98   GLint getLightsDirectionalHowMany(   );
      99   GLint getLightsPointHowMany(   );
          
     101   void updateLightEntities(   );
          
     103   void pushLightUniformsDR(  space::Camera& c,   core::Program* program );
     104   void pushLightUniforms(  space::Camera& c,   core::Program* program );
     105   void pushLightUniformBuffers(  core::Program* program );
          
     107   void updateDeferredBufferSpot(  GLuint lightID,   core::Program* program,   GLint currentShadowUnit );
     108   void updateDeferredBufferDirectional(  GLuint lightID,   core::Program* program,   GLint currentShadowUnit );
     109   void updateDeferredBufferPoint(  GLuint lightID,   core::Program* program,   GLint currentShadowUnit );
          
     111   pLightSpot getLightSpot(  GLint i );
     112   pLightPoint getLightPoint(  GLint i );
     113   pLightDirectional getLightDirectional(  GLint i );
          
     115   GLint obtainTextureUnit(   );
     116   void freeTextureUnit(  GLint id );
          
     118   void bindShadowmaps(   );
          
          private:
           const glm::mat4 mBiasMatrix = glm::mat4(  0.5,   0.0,   0.0,   0.0,  
           0.0,   0.5,   0.0,   0.0,  
           0.0,   0.0,   0.5,   0.0,  
           0.5,   0.5,   0.5,   1.0 );
          
           GLsizei mShadowWidth;
           GLsizei mShadowHeight;
          
           std::vector<pLightSpot> mSpotLights;
           std::vector<pLightDirectional> mDirectionalLights;
           std::vector<pLightPoint> mPointLights;
           std::vector<fillwave::space::LighUniformData> mLightBufferData;
          
           GLboolean isRefreshLightSpot(   );
           GLboolean isRefreshLightDirectional(   );
           GLboolean isRefreshLightPoint(   );
          
           GLfloat computePointLightBoundingSphere(  pLightPoint& light );
          
          };
          
          } /* manager */
          typedef std::unique_ptr<manager::LightManager> puLightManager;
          } /* fillwave*/
          
          #endif /* LIGHTMANAGER_H_ */

           pProgram mProgram;
          };

           std::string mFilePath;

           void reload (  Engine* engine );
          };

           *
           * \brief Manager to handle ShaderObject objects.
           *

          private:

          public:
      63   ShaderManager(  const std::string& rootPath );
      64   virtual ~ShaderManager(   );

      67   pShader add(  const std::string& shaderName,  const int shaderType,   const std::string& shaderSource );
      68   pShader get(  std::string path );
          
      70   std::vector<puShaderObject> mShaderObjects;
          
      72   void reload(   );
          };
          
          } /* manager */

../inc/fillwave/management/TextureManager.h

          /*
           * TextureManager.h
           *
           * Created on: 15 Apr 2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef TEXTUREMANAGER_H_
          #define TEXTUREMANAGER_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/core/texturing/Texture1D.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/rendering/Texture2DRenderableDynamic.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/rendering/Texture3DRenderableDynamic.h>
          
          #include <fillwave/loaders/TextureLoader.h>
          
          #include <fillwave/Assets.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
          namespace manager {
          
          /*! \class TextureObject
           * \brief Template class for all texture objects.
           */
          
          template <class T>
      46  class TextureObject {
          public:
      48   T mTexture;
          };
          
          /*! \typedef TextureObject1D
           * \brief Data structure containing each Texture1D instance info.
           */
          
          typedef TextureObject<pTexture1D> TextureObject1D;
          typedef std::unique_ptr<TextureObject1D > puTextureObject1D;
          
          /*! \typedef TextureObject2DDeferred
           * \brief Data structure containing each Texture2D instance info for deferred rendering.
           */
          
          typedef TextureObject<pTexture2D> TextureObject2DDeferred;
          typedef std::unique_ptr<TextureObject2DDeferred > puTextureObject2DDeferred;
          
          /*! \class TextureObject2D
           * \brief Data structure containing each Texture2D instance info.
           */
          
          template <class T>
      70  class TextureObject2D : public TextureObject<T> {
          public:
      72   std::string mFilePath;
          };
          typedef TextureObject2D<pTexture2D> TextureObject2DStatic;
          typedef std::unique_ptr<TextureObject2DStatic> puTextureObject2D;
          
          /*! \typedef TextureObject2DRenderable
           * \brief Data structure containing each Texture2DRenderable instance info.
           */
          
          typedef TextureObject<pTexture2DRenderable> TextureObject2DRenderable;
          typedef std::unique_ptr<TextureObject2DRenderable> puTextureObject2DRenderable;
          
          /*! \typedef TextureObject2DDynamic
           * \brief Data structure containing each TextureObject2DDynamic instance info.
           */
          
          typedef TextureObject2D<pTexture2DRenderableDynamic> TextureObject2DDynamic;
          typedef std::unique_ptr<TextureObject2DDynamic > puTextureObject2DDynamic;
          
          /*! \typedef TextureObject3D
           * \brief Data structure containing each Texture3D instance info.
           */
          
          template <class T>
      96  class TextureObject3D : public TextureObject<T> {
          public:
      98   std::string mFilePathPosX;
      99   std::string mFilePathNegX;
     100   std::string mFilePathPosY;
     101   std::string mFilePathNegY;
     102   std::string mFilePathPosZ;
     103   std::string mFilePathNegZ;
          };
          typedef TextureObject3D<pTexture3D> TextureObject3DStatic;
          typedef std::unique_ptr<TextureObject3DStatic > puTextureObject3D;
          
          /*! \typedef TextureObject3DRenderable
           * \brief Data structure containing each Texture2DRenderable instance info.
           */
          
          typedef TextureObject<pTexture3DRenderable> TextureObject3DRenderable;
          typedef std::unique_ptr<TextureObject3DRenderable> puTextureObject3DRenderable;
          
          /*! \typedef TextureObject3DDynamic
           * \brief Data structure containing each Texture3DRenderableDynamic instance info.
           */
          
          typedef TextureObject3D<pTexture3DRenderableDynamic> TextureObject3DDynamic;
          typedef std::unique_ptr<TextureObject3DDynamic > puTextureObject3DDynamic;
          
          /*! \class TextureManager
           * \brief Manager to handle TextureObject1D,   TextureObject2D and TextureObject3D objects.
           */
          
     126  class TextureManager {
          public:
     128   TextureManager(  const std::string& rootPath );
     129   virtual ~TextureManager(   );
          
     131   pTexture get(  std::string texturePath,  
           GLuint mapType = FILLWAVE_TEXTURE_TYPE_NONE,  
           loader::eFlip flip = loader::eFlip::FILLWAVE_TEXTURE_FLIP_VERTICAL );
          
     135   pTexture3D get(  const std::string& posX,  
     136   const std::string& negX,  
     137   const std::string& posY,  
     138   const std::string& negY,  
     139   const std::string& posZ,  
     140   const std::string& negZ );
          
     142   pTexture2DRenderable getShadow2D(  GLuint width,   GLuint height );
          
     144   pTexture3DRenderable getShadow3D(  GLuint width,   GLuint height );
          
     146   pTexture2DRenderable getColor2D(  GLuint width,   GLuint height );
          
     148   pTexture2D getDeferredColor(  GLuint width,   GLuint height,   GLuint size = 1 );
          
     150   pTexture2D getDeferredColorScreen(  GLuint width,   GLuint height,   GLuint size = 1 );
          
     152   pTexture2D getDeferredDepth(  GLuint width,   GLuint height );
          
     154   pTexture2D getDeferredStencilDepth(  GLuint width,   GLuint height );
          
     156   pTexture2DRenderableDynamic getDynamic(  const std::string& fragmentShaderPath,  
     157   pProgram program,  
     158   glm::ivec2 screenSize );
          
     160   GLboolean check(  std::string texturePath,  
           GLuint mapType = FILLWAVE_TEXTURE_TYPE_NONE );
          
     163   void reload(   );
          
     165   void resizeTextures(  GLuint width,   GLuint height );
     166   void resize(  GLuint width,   GLuint height );
          
          private:
     169   std::vector<puTextureObject1D > mTextureObjects1D;
     170   std::vector<puTextureObject2D > mTextureObjects2D;
     171   std::vector<puTextureObject2DDynamic > mTextureObjects2DDynamic;
     172   std::vector<puTextureObject2DRenderable> mTextureObjects2DRenderable;
     173   std::vector<puTextureObject3D > mTextureObjects3D;
     174   std::vector<puTextureObject3DDynamic > mTextureObjects3DDynamic;
     175   std::vector<puTextureObject3DRenderable > mTextureObjects3DRenderable;
     176   std::vector<puTextureObject2DDeferred > mTextureObjects2DDeferred;
     177   std::string mRootPath;
     178   puTextureLoader mLoader;
          
     180   void add(  std::string filePath,  
     181   GLuint mapType,  
     182   loader::eFlip flip );
          
     184   void add(  const std::string& posX,  
     185   const std::string& negX,  
     186   const std::string& posY,  
     187   const std::string& negY,  
     188   const std::string& posZ,  
     189   const std::string& negZ );
          
     191   void addDynamic(  const std::string& fragmentShaderPath,  
     192   pProgram program,  
     193   glm::ivec2 screenSize );
          
           template <class T>
           inline void reload(  std::vector<T>& textures ) {
           for(  auto& it : textures ) {
           it->mTexture->reload(   );
           }
           }
          
           template <class T>
           inline void resize(  std::vector<T>& textures,   GLuint width,   GLuint height ) {
           for(  auto& it : textures ) {
           it->mTexture->resize(  width,   height );
           }
           }
          
          };
          
          } /* manager */
          typedef std::unique_ptr<manager::TextureManager> puTextureManager;
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* TEXTUREMANAGER_H_ */

           * \brief Builder which builds the model from the asset file.
           */

          public:

      45   std::string modelPath,  
      46   pProgram program );
          
      48   virtual ~BuilderModel(   );
          
      50   virtual pModel build(   );

      54   BuilderModel& setProgram(  pProgram program );

          };

          };

           * \brief BuilderModel which builds the model from textures and material fillwave objects.
           */

          public:
      41   BuilderModelManual(  Engine* engine,  
           std::string modelPath = "",  
           pProgram program = pProgram(   ),

           pTexture normalMap = pTexture(   ),  
           pTexture specularMap = pTexture(   ),  
           Material material = Material(   ) );
          
      49   virtual ~BuilderModelManual(   );

      53   BuilderModelManual& setNormalMapTexture(  pTexture texture );

      59   pModel build(   );

      62   pTexture mDiffuseMap;
      63   pTexture mNormalMap;
      64   pTexture mSpecularMap;
      65   Material mMaterial;
          };

../inc/fillwave/models/Entity.h

       1  /*
           * Entity.h
           *
           * Created on: 2 Apr 2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef ENTITY_H_
          #define ENTITY_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/space/Camera.h>
          #include <fillwave/actions/ItemCallback.h>
          #include <vector>
          
          namespace fillwave {
          
          namespace models {
      37  class Entity;
          }
          typedef std::shared_ptr<models::Entity> pEntity;
          
          namespace models {
          
          /*! \class Entity
           *
           * \brief Base for all Scene nodes.
           *
           */
          
      49  class Entity : public Moveable {
          public:
      51   Entity(  glm::mat4 model = glm::mat4(  1.0 ),  
           glm::vec3 translation = glm::vec3(  0.0 ),  
           glm::quat orientation = glm::quat(  1.0,   0.0,   0.0,   0.0 ) );
          
      55   virtual ~Entity(   );
          
           /* Attach/Detach */
      58   void attach(  pEntity child );
      59   void detach(  pEntity child );
          
      61   void onDetached(   );
      62   void onAttached(  Entity* parent );
          
           /* Draws */
          
           /* Drawing */
      67   virtual void draw(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      69   virtual void drawDR(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      71   virtual void drawDepth(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      73   virtual void drawDepthColor(  space::Camera& camera,   glm::vec3& position );
          
      75   virtual void drawAOG(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      77   virtual void drawAOC(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      79   virtual void drawOcclusionBox(  space::Camera& camera );
          
           /* Flags */
      82   GLboolean isPSC(   );
          
      84   GLboolean isPSR(   );
          
           /* Callbacks */
      87   void handleHierarchyEvent(  actions::EventType* event );
      88   void handlePrivateEvent(  actions::EventType* event );
          
           /* Model */
      91   glm::mat4 getTransformation(   );
          
           /* Physics */
      94   void setTransformation(  glm::mat4 modelMatrix );
          
           /* Callbacks */
      97   void attachHierarchyCallback(  actions::ItemCallback* callback );
      98   void attachPrivateCallback(  actions::ItemCallback* callback );
      99   void detachHierarchyCallback(  actions::ItemCallback* callback );
     100   void detachPrivateCallback(  actions::ItemCallback* callback );
          
           /* Parent */
     103   void updateMatrixTree(   );
     104   void updateParentMatrix(  glm::mat4& parent );
     105   void updateParentRotation(  glm::quat& rotation );
     106   glm::mat4 getParentMatrix(   );
     107   glm::quat getParentRotation(   );
          
           /* Picking */
     110   void pick(  glm::vec3 color );
     111   void unpick(   );
     112   GLboolean isPickable(   );
     113   glm::vec3 getPickableColor(   );
     114   virtual void onPicked(   );
     115   virtual void onUnpicked(   );
     116   virtual void drawPicking(  space::Camera& camera );
          
           /* External refresh */
     119   void setExternalRefresh(  GLboolean state );
     120   GLboolean isExternalRefresh(   );
     121   void setExternalRefresh(   );
          
           /* Log */
     124   virtual void log(   );
          
          protected:
     127   glm::quat mParentRotation;
     128   glm::mat4 mParentMatrix;
     129   glm::mat4 mTransformation;
          
     131   GLboolean mParentRefresh;
     132   std::vector<pEntity> mChildren;
     133   GLboolean mChildrenPropagateEvent;
     134   std::vector<actions::ItemCallback*> mCallbacksHierarchy;
     135   std::vector<actions::ItemCallback*> mCallbacksPrivate;
          
     137   GLboolean mPSC;
     138   GLboolean mPSR;
          
          private:
     141   GLboolean mRefreshExternal;
     142   GLboolean mPickable;
     143   glm::vec3 mPickColor;
          
     145   void detachChildren(   );
     146   void handleEvent(  std::vector<actions::ItemCallback*>& callbacks,   actions::EventType* event );
     147   void eraseFinishedCallbacks(  std::vector<actions::ItemCallback*>& callbacks );
     148   void detachCallback(  std::vector<actions::ItemCallback*>& callbacks,   actions::ItemCallback* callback );
          };
          } /* models */
     151  static pEntity buildEntity(   ) {
           return pEntity (  new models::Entity(   ) );
          }
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* ENTITY_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/models/Material.h

       1  /*
           * Material.h

           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef SRC_MODELS_MATERIAL_H_
          #define SRC_MODELS_MATERIAL_H_

           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.

          namespace models {

           * \brief Per mesh material info.
           */

          public:
      42   Material(   );

      44   virtual ~Material(   );

          };

../inc/fillwave/models/Mesh.h

       1  /*
           * Mesh.h
           *
           * Created on: Feb 19,   2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef MESH_H_
          #define MESH_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/core/texturing/Texture2D.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/texturing/TextureRegion.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/buffers/VertexBufferBasic.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/buffers/IndexBufferBasic.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/operations/Query.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/operations/ConditionalRender.h>
          #include <fillwave/models/Entity.h>
          #include <fillwave/models/Material.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/pipeline/Fence.h>
          #include <fillwave/models/Reloadable.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
      42  class Engine;
          
          namespace manager {
      45  class BoneManager;
      46  class LightManager;
          }
          
          namespace models {
          
          /*! \class Mesh
           * \brief Basic drawable Entity.
           */
          
      55  class Mesh: public Entity,   public Reloadable {
          public:
      57   Mesh(  Engine* engine,  
           const Material& material,  
           pTextureRegion diffuseMap,  
           pTextureRegion normalMap,  
           pTextureRegion specularMap,  
           pProgram program,  
           pProgram ProgramShadow,  
           pProgram programShadowColor,  
           pProgram programOcclusion,  
           pProgram programAmbientOcclusionGeometry,  
           pProgram programAmbientOcclusionColor,  
           manager::LightManager* lightManager = nullptr,  
           pVertexBufferBasic vbo = pVertexBufferBasic(   ),  
           pIndexBufferBasic ibo = pIndexBufferBasic(   ),  
           manager::BoneManager* boneManager = nullptr,  
           GLenum drawType = GL_TRIANGLES );
          
      74   virtual ~Mesh(   );
          
      76   virtual void onDraw(   );
          
      78   void draw(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      80   void drawDR(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      82   void drawFast(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      84   void drawPicking(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      86   void drawDepth(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      88   void drawDepthColor(  space::Camera& camera,   glm::vec3& position );
          
      90   void drawAOG(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      92   void drawAOC(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      94   void drawOcclusionBox(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      96   void log(   );
          
          protected:
      99   pProgram mProgram,  
           mProgramDR,  
           mProgramShadow,  
           mProgramShadowColor,  
           mProgramOQ,  
           mProgramAOGeometry,  
           mProgramAOColor;
          
     107   pTextureRegion mDiffuseMap;
     108   pTextureRegion mNormalMap;
     109   pTextureRegion mSpecularMap;
          
     111   Material mMaterial;
          
           /* Draw */
     114   GLenum mDrawType;
          
           /* Light */
     117   manager::LightManager* mLightManager;
          
           /* Animations */
     120   manager::BoneManager* mBoneManager;
          
           /* Buffers */
     123   pVertexBufferBasic mVBO;
          
     125   glm::mat4 mOcclusionMatrix;
          
     127   pIndexBufferBasic mIBO;
          
           /* Occlusion cut off */
     130   core::QueryIfAnySamplesPassed mOcclusionQuery;
          // puFence mFence;
          
          #ifdef __ANDROID__
          #else
          // core::QueryTimeElapsed mTimeQuery;
     136   core::ConditionalRender mConditionalRendering;
          #endif
          
          private:
          
           /* ULC - Uniform location cache */
          
     143   GLint mULCModelMatrix,  
           mULCViewProjectionMatrix,  
           mULCLightAmbientIntensity,  
           mULCLightDiffuseIntensity,  
           mULCLightSpecularIntensity,  
           mULCCameraPosition,  
           mULCColorPicking,  
           mULCPainterColor;
          
     152   GLint mULCMVPOcclusion;
          
     154   GLint mULCMVPShadow;
          
     156   GLint mULCMVPShadowColor,  
           mULCModelMatrixShadowColor;
          
     159   GLint mULCMVPAmbientOcclusion,  
           mULCPositionAmbientOcclusion;
          
     162   GLint mULCSampleRadius,  
           mULCProjectionMatrix;
          
     165   void initBuffers(   );
          
     167   void initPipeline(   );
          
     169   void initUniformsCache(   );
          
     171   void initVAO(   );
          
     173   void initVBO(   );
          
     175   void bindTextures(   );
          
     177   void coreDraw(   );
          };
          
          } /* models */
          typedef std::shared_ptr<models::Mesh> pMesh;
          typedef std::unique_ptr<models::Mesh> puMesh;
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* MODELOBJ_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/models/Model.h

       1  /*
           * Model.h
           *
           * Created on: Jun 12,   2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef MODEL_H_
          #define MODEL_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/models/Programmable.h>
          #include <fillwave/models/Mesh.h>
          #include <fillwave/Assets.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
      35  class Engine;
          namespace models {
      37  class Model;
          }
          namespace actions {
      40  class TimedBoneUpdateCallback;
          }
          }
          
          namespace fillwave {
          typedef std::shared_ptr<models::Model> pModel;
          namespace models {
          
          /*! \class Model
           * \brief Drawable Mesh set.
           */
          
      52  class Model: public Programmable {
          public:
          
      55   Model(  Engine* engine,  
      56   pProgram program,  
      57   Shape<core::VertexBasic>& shape,  
      58   pTexture diffuseMap,  
      59   pTexture normalMap,  
      60   pTexture specularMap,  
      61   const Material& material );
          
      63   Model(  Engine* engine,  
      64   pProgram program,  
      65   const std::string& shapePath );
          
      67   Model(  Engine* engine,  
      68   pProgram program,  
      69   const std::string& shapePath,  
      70   const std::string& diffuseMapPath,  
      71   const std::string& normalMapPath = "",  
      72   const std::string& specularMapPath = "" );
          
      74   Model(  Engine* engine,  
           pProgram program,  
           const std::string& shapePath,  
           pTexture diffuseMap,  
           pTexture normalMap = pTexture(   ),  
           pTexture specularMap = pTexture(   ),  
           const Material& material = Material(   ) );
          
      82   virtual ~Model(   );
          
      84   void reload(   );
          
      86   void draw(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      88   void drawDR(  space::Camera& camera );
          
           /* Animation */
      91   void performAnimation(  GLfloat timeElapsed_us );
          
      93   void setActiveAnimation(  GLint animationID );
          
      95   GLint getActiveAnimations(   );
          
      97   void log(   );
          
          protected:
     100   manager::BoneManager* mBoneManager;
          
     102   pProgram mProgramShadow,  
           mProgramShadowColor;
          
     105   GLint mUniformLocationCacheBones,  
           mUniformLocationCacheBonesShadow,  
           mUniformLocationCacheBonesShadowColor;
          private:
           /* Animation */
     110   GLint mActiveAnimation;
          
     112   actions::TimedBoneUpdateCallback* mAnimationCallback;
          
     114   void initUniformsCache(   );
          
     116   void initShadowing(  Engine* engine );
          
     118   void initAnimations(  const fScene* scene );
          
     120   void evaluateAnimations(   );
          
           /* Mesh tree */
     123   void loadNodeTransformations(  fNode* node,   Entity* entity );
          
     125   void loadNodes(  fNode* node,  
     126   const fScene* scene,  
     127   Engine* engine,  
     128   Entity* entity );
          
     130   void loadNodes(  fNode* node,  
     131   const fScene* scene,  
     132   Engine* engine,  
     133   Entity* entity,  
     134   const std::string& diffuseMapPath,  
     135   const std::string& normalMapPath,  
     136   const std::string& specularMapPath );
          
     138   void loadNodes(  fNode* node,  
     139   const fScene* scene,  
     140   Engine* engine,  
     141   Entity* entity,  
     142   pTexture diffuseMap,  
     143   pTexture normalMap,  
     144   pTexture specularMap,  
     145   const Material& material );
          
     147   pMesh loadMesh(  const fMesh* shape,  
     148   const Material& material,  
     149   pTextureRegion diffuseMap,  
     150   pTextureRegion normalMap,  
     151   pTextureRegion specularMap,  
     152   Engine* engine );
          };
          
          } /* models */
          
     157  static pModel buildModel(  Engine* engine,  
           pProgram program,  
           models::Shape<core::VertexBasic>& shape,  
           pTexture diffuseMap = pTexture(   ),  
           pTexture normalMap = pTexture(   ),  
           pTexture specularMap = pTexture(   ),  
           models::Material material = models::Material(   ) ) {
           return pModel(  new models::Model (  engine,   program,   shape,   diffuseMap,   normalMap,   specularMap,   material ) );
          }
          
     167  static pModel buildModel(  Engine* engine,  
           pProgram program,  
           const std::string& shapePath,  
           const std::string& diffuseMapPath,  
           const std::string& normalMapPath = "",  
           const std::string& specularMapPath = "" ) {
           return pModel(  new models::Model (  engine,   program,   shapePath,   diffuseMapPath,   normalMapPath,   specularMapPath ) );
          }
          
     176  static pModel buildModel(  Engine* engine,  
           pProgram program,  
           const std::string& shapePath,  
           pTexture diffuseMap,  
           pTexture normalMap = pTexture(   ),  
           pTexture specularMap = pTexture(   ),  
           models::Material material = models::Material(   ) ) {
           return pModel(  new models::Model (  engine,   program,   shapePath,   diffuseMap,   normalMap,   specularMap ) );
          }
          
     186  static pModel buildModel(  Engine* engine,  
           pProgram program,  
           const std::string& shapePath ) {
           return pModel(  new models::Model (  engine,   program,   shapePath ) );
          }
          
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* MODEL_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/models/Moveable.h

       1  /*
           * Moveable.h
           *
           * Created on: Jun 2,   2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef MOVEABLE_H_
          #define MOVEABLE_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/OpenGL.h>
          #include <fillwave/Math.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
          namespace models {
          
          /*! \class Moveable
           * \brief Base for every object which has a 3D position.
           */
          
      40  class Moveable {
          public:
      42   Moveable(  glm::vec3 translation = glm::vec3(  0.0 ),  
           glm::quat rotation = glm::quat(  1.0,  0.0,  0.0,  0.0 ) );
      44   virtual ~Moveable(   );
          
      46   void moveTo(  glm::vec3 coordinates );
      47   void moveToX(  GLfloat distance );
      48   void moveToY(  GLfloat distance );
      49   void moveToZ(  GLfloat distance );
      50   void moveBy(  glm::vec3 coordinates );
      51   void moveByX(  GLfloat distance );
      52   void moveByY(  GLfloat distance );
      53   void moveByZ(  GLfloat distance );
      54   void moveInDirection(  glm::vec3 direction );
      55   glm::vec3 getTranslation(   );
          
      57   void scaleTo(  GLfloat scale );
      58   void scaleTo(  glm::vec3 scale );
      59   void scaleToX(  GLfloat scale );
      60   void scaleToY(  GLfloat scale );
      61   void scaleToZ(  GLfloat scale );
      62   glm::vec3 getScale(   );
          
      64   void rotateTo(  glm::quat rotation );
      65   void rotateTo(  const glm::vec3 &axis,   GLfloat angle );
      66   void rotateBy(  const glm::vec3 &axis,   GLfloat angle );
      67   void rotateByX(  float angle );
      68   void rotateByY(  float angle );
      69   void rotateByZ(  float angle );
      70   glm::quat getRotation(   );
          
      72   void updateMatrixCache(   );
          
      74   GLboolean isRefresh(   );
      75   void resetRefresh(   );
          
          protected:
      78   glm::fvec3 mTranslation;
      79   glm::quat mRotation;
      80   glm::vec3 mScale;
      81   glm::mat4 mModelMatrixCache;
          
           /* Refresh should be always set by us,   but reset by the others */
      84   GLboolean mRefresh;
          };
          
          } /* models */
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* MOVEABLE_H_ */

           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents

           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction

          namespace models {

           * \brief Entity for which is it possible to add/remove Effect objects.
           */

          public:
      42   Programmable(  pProgram program );

          };

      62   virtual void draw(   ) = 0;
          
      64   virtual void drawDR(   ) = 0;
          
      66   virtual void drawAOG(   ) = 0;
          
      68   virtual void drawAOC(   ) = 0;

      90   virtual void onShow(   ){(  void )this;}
          
      92   virtual void onHide(   ){(  void )this;}
          
          protected:
      95   pCursor mCursor;

      97   std::map<GLint,   pEntity> mPickingTable;
      98   pEntity mLastPicked;
      99   glm::vec3 mAmbientGlobal;
          
          private:
     102   const GLint MAXIMUM_TRIALS_TO_PICK_COLOR = 2000;
          };

../inc/fillwave/models/SceneOrthographic.h

       1  /*

          namespace fillwave {
          namespace models {
      35  class SceneOrthographic;
          }
          typedef std::shared_ptr<models::SceneOrthographic> pSceneOrthographic;
          namespace models {
          
          /*! \class SceneOrthographic
           * \brief Scene with orthographic projection.
           *
           */
          
      45  class SceneOrthographic: public Scene {
          public:
      47   SceneOrthographic(  pCameraOrthographic camera = pCameraOrthographic(   ) );
          
      49   virtual ~SceneOrthographic(   );
          
      51   void setCamera(  pCameraOrthographic camera );
          
      53   pCamera getCamera(   );
          
      55   void draw(   );
          
      57   void drawDR(   );
          
      59   void draw(  space::CameraOrthographic& camera );
          
      61   void drawDR(  space::CameraOrthographic& camera );
          
      63   void drawPicking(   );
          
      65   void drawSkybox(   );
          
      67   void drawDepthInt(   );
          
      69   void drawAOG(   );
          
      71   void drawAOC(   );
          
      73   void drawOcclusion(   );
          
          private:
      76   pCameraOrthographic mCamera;
          };
          
          } /* models */
      80  static pSceneOrthographic buildSceneOrthographic(  pCameraOrthographic camera = pCameraOrthographic(   ) ) {
           return pSceneOrthographic (  new models::SceneOrthographic(  camera ) );
          }
          } /* fillwave */
          #endif /* SCENEOrthographic_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/models/ScenePerspective.h

       1  /*
           * ScenePerspective.h
           *
           * Created on: 6 May 2015
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef ScenePerspective_H_
          #define ScenePerspective_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/models/Scene.h>
          #include <fillwave/space/CameraPerspective.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
          namespace models {
      35  class ScenePerspective;
          }
          typedef std::shared_ptr<models::ScenePerspective> pScenePerspective;
          namespace models {
          
          /*! \class ScenePerspective
           * \brief Scene with perspective projection.
           *
           */
          
      45  class ScenePerspective: public Scene {
          public:
      47   ScenePerspective(  pCameraPerspective camera = pCameraPerspective(   ) );
          
      49   virtual ~ScenePerspective(   );
          
      51   void setCamera(  pCameraPerspective camera );
          
      53   pCamera getCamera(   );
          
      55   void draw(   );
          
      57   void drawDR(   );
          
      59   void draw(  space::CameraPerspective& camera );
          
      61   void drawDR(  space::CameraPerspective& camera );
          
      63   void drawPicking(   );
          
      65   void drawSkybox(   );
          
      67   void drawDepthInt(   );
          
      69   void drawAOG(   );
          
      71   void drawAOC(   );
          
      73   void drawOcclusion(   );
          
          private:
      76   pCameraPerspective mCamera;
          };
          
          } /* models */
      80  static pScenePerspective buildScenePerspective(  pCameraPerspective camera = pCameraPerspective(   ) ) {
           return pScenePerspective (  new models::ScenePerspective(  camera ) );
          }
          } /* fillwave */
          #endif /* ScenePerspective_H_ */

      88   glm::vec3 mStartVelocity;
      89   glm::vec3 mRobustnessVelocity;

       1  /*

           */
          
          #ifndef EMITERPOINT_H_

           *
           * \brief Drawable Entity which emits particles.
           *
           */

          public:

      53   GLfloat size,  
      54   GLfloat lifetime,

      56   glm::vec4 color,  
      57   GLenum blendingSource,  
      58   GLenum blendingDestination,  
      59   GLboolean depthTesting,  
      60   GLfloat alphaCutOff );
          
      62   virtual ~EmiterPoint(   );
          
      64   virtual void update(  GLfloat timeElapsedSec ) = 0;
          
      66   virtual void draw(  space::Camera& camera ) = 0;
          
      68   void setBlendingFunction(  GLenum sourceFactor,   GLenum destinationFactor  );
          
          protected:
      71   GLfloat mLifetime;
      72   GLfloat mStartSize;
      73   GLfloat mHowMany;
      74   GLboolean mDepthTesting;
          
      76   glm::vec4 mColor;
           common::Blending mBlending;
      78   GLfloat mAlphaCutOff;
          
      80   pProgram mProgram;
      81   pIndexBufferParticles mIBO;
      82   pTexture mTexture;
          
          };

          #endif /* EMITERPOINT_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/particles/EmiterPointCPU.h

       1  /*
           * EmiterPointCPU.h
           *
           * Created on: Sep 10,   2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef EMITER_POINT_CPU_H_
          #define EMITER_POINT_CPU_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/particles/EmiterPoint.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/buffers/VertexBufferFloat.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/operations/Query.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
          namespace particles {
          
          /*! \class EmiterPointCPU
           * \brief Polynomial particle Emiter.
           * Can generate a particles with velocity,   direction,  
           * and acceleration defined by the user.
           */
          
      43  class EmiterPointCPU: public EmiterPoint {
          public:
      45   EmiterPointCPU(  Engine* engine,  
           GLfloat emitingSourceRate,  
           GLuint howMany,  
           glm::vec4 color,  
           glm::vec3 acceleration = glm::vec3(  0.0 ),  
           glm::vec3 startVelocity = glm::vec3(  0.0 ),  
           glm::vec3 robustnessVelocity = glm::vec3(  0.0 ),  
           glm::vec3 startPosition = glm::vec3(  0.0 ),  
           glm::vec3 robustnessPosition = glm::vec3(  0.0 ),  
           GLfloat startSize = 1.0,  
           GLfloat lifetime = 6.0,  
           pTexture texture = pTexture(   ),  
           GLenum blendingSource = GL_SRC_ALPHA,  
           GLenum blendingDestination = GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA,  
           GLboolean depthTesting = GL_TRUE,  
           GLfloat alphaCutOffLevel = 0.0 );
          
      62   virtual ~EmiterPointCPU(   );
          
      64   void update(  GLfloat timeElapsedSec );
          
      66   void draw(  space::Camera& camera );
          
          private:
      69   glm::vec3 mAcceleration;
      70   glm::vec3 mStartVelocity;
      71   glm::vec3 mStartPosition;
      72   glm::vec3 mCameraPosition;
          
           /* CD - Camera distance */
          
      76   pVertexBufferParticles mVBO;
          
      78   GLint mULCModelMatrix,  
           mULCTextureUnit,  
           mULCViewProjectionMatrix,  
           mULCCameraPosition,  
           mULCPointSize,  
           mULCColor,  
           mULCAcceleration,  
           mULCLifeTime,  
           mULCAlphaCutOff,  
           mULCSourcePosition,  
           mULCTimeElapsed;
          
      90   void initBuffers(   );
          
      92   void initPipeline(   );
          
      94   void initUniformsCache(   );
          
      96   void initVAO(   );
          
      98   void initVBO(   );
          
     100   void coreDraw(   );
          };
          
          } /* particles */
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* EMITER_POINT_CPU_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/particles/EmiterPointGPU.h

       1  /*
           * EmiterPointGPU.h
           *
           * Created on: 22 Apr 2015
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef EMITERPOINTGPU_H_
          #define EMITERPOINTGPU_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/particles/EmiterPoint.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/buffers/VertexBufferParticlesGPU.h>
          #include <fillwave/core/pipeline/Fence.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
      35  class Engine;
          namespace particles {
          
          /*! \class EmiterPointGPU
           * \brief Polynomial particle Emiter entirely computed on GPU.
           * Can generate a particles with velocity,   direction,  
           * and acceleration defined by the user.
           */
          
      44  class EmiterPointGPU : public EmiterPoint {
          public:
      46   EmiterPointGPU(  Engine* engine,  
      47   GLfloat emitingSourceRate,  
      48   GLuint howMany,  
      49   glm::vec4 color,  
      50   glm::vec3 acceleration,  
      51   glm::vec3 startVelocity,  
      52   glm::vec3 robustnessVelocity,  
      53   glm::vec3 startPosition,  
      54   glm::vec3 robustnessPosition,  
      55   GLfloat startSize,  
      56   GLfloat lifetime,  
      57   pTexture texture,  
      58   GLenum blendingSource,  
      59   GLenum blendingDestination,  
      60   GLboolean depthTesting,  
      61   GLfloat alphaCutOffLevel = 0.0 );
          
      63   virtual ~EmiterPointGPU(   );
          
      65   void draw(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      67   void update(  GLfloat timeElapsedSec );
          
          private:
      70   static const GLint mPingPongBuffers = 2;
      71   GLfloat mEmmisingSourceRate;
      72   GLuint mNoiseTextureHandle;
      73   glm::vec3 mAcceleration;
      74   glm::vec3 mStartVelocity;
      75   glm::vec3 mRobustnessVelocity;
      76   glm::vec3 mStartPosition;
      77   glm::vec3 mRobustnessPosition;
      78   glm::vec3 mCameraPosition;
      79   GLfloat mTimeDeltaEmiter;
      80   pProgram mProgramEmiter;
      81   GLuint mSrcIndex;
      82   puFence mFence;
      83   pVertexBufferParticlesGPU mVBOGPU[mPingPongBuffers];
          
      85   GLint mULCTimeEmiter,  
           mULCEmissionRateEmiter,  
           mULCModelMatrixEmiter,  
           mULCCameraPositionEmiter,  
           mULCHowManyEmiter,  
           mULCAccelerationEmiter,  
           mULCStartVelocityEmiter,  
           mULCStartPositionEmiter,  
           mULCLifeTimeEmiter,  
           mULCRobustnessVelocityEmiter,  
           mULCRobustnessPositionEmiter,  
           mULCNoiseSamplerEmiter;
          
      98   GLint mULCModelMatrix,  
           mULCViewProjectionMatrix,  
           mULCCameraPosition,  
           mULCTextureUnit,  
           mULCTime,  
           mULCAcceleration,  
           mULCColor,  
           mULCAlphaCutOff,  
           mULCStartSize;
          
     108   void initBuffers(   );
          
     110   void initPipeline(   );
          
     112   void initVBO(   );
          
     114   void initVAO(   );
          
     116   void initUniformsCache(   );
          
     118   void coreDraw(   );
          
     120   void sort(  glm::vec3 cameraPosition );
          };
          
          } /* particles */
          typedef std::shared_ptr<particles::EmiterPointGPU> pEmiterPointGPU;
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* EMITERPOINTGPU_H_ */

           * \brief Drawable Entity built by fragment shader. Time limited.
           *
           */

          private:
      51   pTexture mTexture;
      52   pSampler mSampler;

           GLfloat size,  
           pTexture texture = pTexture(   ),  
           GLenum blendingSource = GL_SRC_ALPHA,  
           GLenum blendingDestination = GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA );
      67   virtual ~Impostor(   );
      68   virtual void draw(  space::Camera& camera );
          };
          
          } /* models */

../inc/fillwave/space/Camera.h

       1  /*
           * Camera.h
           *
           * Created on: May 7,   2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef CAMERA_H_
          #define CAMERA_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/models/Moveable.h>
          #include <memory>
          
          namespace fillwave {
          namespace space {
          
          /*! \class Camera
           * \brief Stores camera view parameters.
           */
          
      40  class Camera : public models::Moveable {
          public:
      42   Camera(   );
          
      44   Camera(  glm::vec3 ,  glm::quat rotation );
          
      46   virtual ~Camera(   );
          
           /*
           * update
           *
           * \brief update projection and camera matrices according to other camera data.
           *
           */
          
      55   void update(   );
          
           /*
           * updateView
           *
           * \brief update view matrix according to other camera data.
           *
           */
          
      64   void updateView(   );
          
           /*
           * updateProjection
           *
           * \brief update projection matrix according to other camera data.
           *
           */
          
      73   virtual void updateProjection(   ) = 0;
          
           /*
           * getEye
           *
           * \brief get the camera 4x4 matrix
           *
           */
          
      82   glm::mat4 getEye(   );
          
           /*
           * getProjectionNearPlane
           *
           * \brief get the projection near plane distance
           *
           */
          
      91   virtual GLfloat getProjectionNearPlane(   ) = 0;
          
           /*
           * getProjectionFarPlane
           *
           * \brief get the projection far plane distance
           *
           */
          
     100   virtual GLfloat getProjectionFarPlane(   ) = 0;
          
           /*
           * getProjection
           *
           * \brief get the projection 4x4 matrix
           *
           */
          
     109   glm::mat4 getProjection(   );
          
           /*
           * getViewProjection
           *
           * \brief get the projection 4x4 matrix multipied by view 4x4 matrix
           *
           */
          
     118   glm::mat4 getViewProjection(   );
          
           /*
           * log
           *
           * \brief log
           *
           */
          
     127   void log(   );
          
          protected:
     130   glm::mat4 mCameraMatrix;
     131   glm::mat4 mProjectionMatrix;
          
     133   GLboolean mRefreshProjection;
     134   GLboolean mRefreshView;
          };
          } /* space */
          typedef std::shared_ptr<space::Camera> pCamera;
          typedef std::weak_ptr<space::Camera> pwCamera;
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* CAMERA_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/space/CameraOrthographic.h

       1  /*
           * CameraOrthographic.h
           *
           * Created on: Dec 21,   2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef CAMERAOrthographic_H_
          #define CAMERAOrthographic_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/space/Camera.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
          namespace space {
          
          /*! \class CullingBox
           * \brief Stores culling box parameters for Orthographic projection.
           */
          
          struct CullingBox {
           GLfloat mProjectionLeft,  
           mProjectionRight,  
           mProjectionBottom,  
           mProjectionTop,  
           mProjectionNear,  
           mProjectionFar;
          };
          
          /*! \class CameraOrthographic
           * \brief Camera with Orthographic projection.
           */
          
      52  class CameraOrthographic: public Camera {
          public:
      54   CameraOrthographic(   );
          
      56   CameraOrthographic(  glm::vec3 position,  
      57   glm::quat rotation,  
      58   GLfloat left,  
      59   GLfloat right,  
      60   GLfloat bottom,  
      61   GLfloat top,  
      62   GLfloat near,  
      63   GLfloat far );
      64   virtual ~CameraOrthographic(   );
          
      66   void updateProjection(   );
           /*
           * getProjectionNearPlane
           *
           * \brief get the projection near plane distance
           *
           */
          
      74   GLfloat getProjectionNearPlane(   );
          
           /*
           * getProjectionFarPlane
           *
           * \brief get the projection far plane distance
           *
           */
          
      83   GLfloat getProjectionFarPlane(   );
          
          private:
           CullingBox mCullingBox;
          
          };
          
          } /* space */
          typedef std::shared_ptr<space::CameraOrthographic> pCameraOrthographic;
          typedef std::weak_ptr<space::CameraOrthographic> pwCameraOrthographic;
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* CAMERAOrthographic_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/space/CameraPerspective.h

       1  /*
           * CameraPerspective.h
           *
           * Created on: Dec 21,   2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef CAMERAPERSPECTIVE_H_
          #define CAMERAPERSPECTIVE_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/space/Camera.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
          namespace space {
          
          /*! \class CameraPerspective
           * \brief Camera with perspective projection.
           */
          
      39  class CameraPerspective :public Camera {
          private:
      41   GLfloat mProjectionFovy,  
           mProjectionAspectRatio,  
           mProjectionNearPlane,  
           mProjectionFarPlane;
          
          public:
      47   CameraPerspective(   );
          
      49   CameraPerspective(  glm::vec3 position,  
      50   glm::quat rotation,  
      51   GLfloat fovy = 90,  
      52   GLfloat aspectRatio = 1,  
      53   GLfloat nearPlane = 0.01,  
      54   GLfloat farPlane = 100.0 );
          
      56   virtual ~CameraPerspective(   );
          
      58   GLfloat getProjectionFovy(   ) { return mProjectionFovy; }
          
      60   GLfloat getProjectionAspectRatio(   ) { return mProjectionAspectRatio; }
          
      62   GLfloat getProjectionNearPlane(   ) { return mProjectionNearPlane; }
          
      64   GLfloat getProjectionFarPlane(   ) { return mProjectionFarPlane; }
          
      66   void setProjectionFovy(  GLfloat fovy ) { mProjectionFovy = fovy ; mRefreshProjection = GL_TRUE;}
          
      68   void setProjectionAspectRatio(  GLfloat aspect ) { mProjectionAspectRatio = aspect; mRefreshProjection = GL_TRUE; }
          
      70   void setProjectionNearPlane(  GLfloat nearPlane ) { mProjectionNearPlane = nearPlane; mRefreshProjection = GL_TRUE; }
          
      72   void setProjectionFarPlane(  GLfloat farPlane ) { mProjectionFarPlane = farPlane; mRefreshProjection = GL_TRUE; }
          
      74   void updateProjection(   );
           };
          } /* space */
          typedef std::shared_ptr<space::CameraPerspective> pCameraPerspective;
          typedef std::weak_ptr<space::CameraPerspective> pwCameraPerspective;
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* CAMERAPERSPECTIVE_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/space/Light.h

       1  /*
           * Light.h
           *
           * Created on: 17 Apr 2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef LIGHT_H_
          #define LIGHT_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/core/rendering/Texture2DRenderable.h>
          #include <fillwave/models/Entity.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
          namespace space {
          
          #define MAX_LIGHTS 4
          #define USED_LIGHT_SLOTS 4
          #if(  USED_LIGHT_SLOTS > MAX_LIGHTS )
          #error "used light slots can not be grater than available lights"
          #endif
          
          /*! \struct LighUniformData
           * \brief Light UBO data.
           */
          
          struct LighUniformData {
           GLfloat position[4];
           GLfloat intensity[4];
           GLfloat mvp[16];
          };
          
          /*! \struct LightAttenuationData
           * \brief Light attenuation data.
           */
          struct LightAttenuationData {
           GLfloat mLinear;
           GLfloat mExp;
          };
          
          /*! \class Light
           * \brief Base for all lights.
           */
          
      64  class Light: public models::Moveable{
          public:
      66   Light(  glm::vec3 position,  
           glm::vec4 intensity,  
           pEntity entity = pEntity(   ) );
      69   virtual ~Light(   );
          
      71   void updateEntity(   );
          
           /* getAttenuation
           *
           * \brief set the light attenuation.
           *
           */
          
      79   void setAttenuation(  LightAttenuationData& attenuation );
          
           /* setAttenuation
           *
           * \brief get the light attenuation.
           *
           */
          
      87   LightAttenuationData getAttenuation(   );
          
           /* setIntensity
           *
           * \brief set the light intensity 4x float (  R,  G,  B,  A )
           *
           */
          
      95   void setIntensity(  glm::vec4 intensity );
          
           /* getIntensity
           *
           * \brief get the light intensity 4x float (  R,  G,  B,  A )
           *
           */
          
     103   glm::vec4 getIntensity(   );
          
           /* setEntity
           *
           * \brief set the entity assigned to this light
           *
           */
          
     111   void setEntity(  pEntity entity );
          
           /* getEntity
           *
           * \brief returns the entity assigned to this light
           *
           */
          
     119   pEntity getEntity(   );
          
           /*
           * log
           *
           * \brief log
           */
          
     127   void log(   );
          
          protected:
     130   pEntity mEntity;
     131   glm::vec4 mIntensity;
           LightAttenuationData mAttenuation;
          };
          
          } /* space */
          typedef std::shared_ptr<space::Light> pLight;
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* LIGHT_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/space/LightDirectional.h

       1  /*
           * LightDirectional.h
           *
           * Created on: Nov 30,   2014
           * Author: filip
           */
          
          #ifndef LIGHTDIRECTIONAL_H_
          #define LIGHTDIRECTIONAL_H_

          #include <fillwave/space/CameraOrthographic.h>

          namespace fillwave {
      35  class Engine;
          namespace space {
          
          /*! \struct LightDirectioData
           * \brief Light UBO data.
           */
          
          struct LightDirectioData {
           GLfloat position[4];
           GLfloat intensity[4];
           GLfloat mvp[16];
          };
          
          /*! \class LightDirectional
           * \brief Light with Orthographic projection.
           */
          
      52  class LightDirectional: public Light {
          public:
      54   LightDirectional(  pTexture2DRenderable shadowTexture,  
      55   glm::vec3 position,  
      56   glm::quat rotation,  
      57   glm::vec4 intensity,  
      58   pEntity entity );
      59   virtual ~LightDirectional(   );
          
      61   pTexture2DRenderable getShadowTexture(   );
          
      63   pCameraOrthographic getShadowCamera(   );
          
      65   void updateShadowCamera(   );
          
      67   void log(   );
          
          private:
      70   pCameraOrthographic mShadowCamera;
      71   pTexture2DRenderable mShadowTexture;
          };
          
          } /* space */

           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/core/rendering/Texture3DRenderable.h>
          #include <fillwave/space/CameraPerspective.h>
          #include <fillwave/models/shapes/Sphere.h>
          #include <fillwave/space/Light.h>
          
          #include <map>
          
          namespace fillwave {
      38  class Engine;
          namespace space {
          
          /*! \class LightPoint
           * \brief Not used.
           */
          
      45  class LightPoint: public Light {
          public:
      47   LightPoint(  pTexture3DRenderable shadowTexture,  
           glm::vec3 position,  
           glm::vec4 intensity,  
           pEntity entity = pEntity(   ) );
          
      52   virtual ~LightPoint(   );
          
      54   pTexture3DRenderable getShadowTexture(   );
          
      56   pCameraPerspective getShadowCamera(  GLenum id );
          
      58   void updateShadowCamera(   );
          
      60   void setEntity(  pEntity entity );
          
           /*! getEntity
           * \brief get the entity assigned to this light
           */
          
      66   pEntity getEntity(   );
          
          protected:
      69   pTexture3DRenderable mShadowTexture;
      70   std::map<GLenum,   pCameraPerspective> mFaceCameras;
          
          private:
      73   pEntity mEntity;
      74   models::Sphere mSphere;
          };
          
          } /* space */
          typedef std::shared_ptr<space::LightPoint> pLightPoint;
          } /* fillwave */
          
          #endif /* LIGHTPOINT_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/terrain/Terrain.h

       1  /*
           * Terrain.h
           *
           * Created on: Sep 23,   2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef TERRAIN_H_
          #define TERRAIN_H_
          
          /*************************************************************************
           *
           * Copyright (  C ) 2015 Filip Wasil
           *
           * All Rights Reserved.
           *
           * NOTICE: All information contained herein is,   and remains
           * the property of Filip Wasil. The intellectual and technical
           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.
           *
           * fillwave@gmail.com
           *
           */
          
          #include <fillwave/terrain/VoxelChunk.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
      33  class Engine;
          namespace terrain {
          
          #define FILLWAVE_VOXEL_CHUNK_SIZE 16
          #define FILLWAVE_QUAD_CHUNK_SIZE 16
          
          /*! \class Terrain
           * \brief Entity to provide terrain generation functionality.
           */
          
      43  class Terrain : public models::Entity {
          public:
      45   Terrain(  GLint radius,   GLfloat gap );
          
      47   virtual ~Terrain(   );
          
      49   void draw(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      51   void addChunk(  pVoxelChunk chunk );
          
          private:
      54   GLint mRadius;
      55   GLfloat mGap;
      56   std::vector<pVoxelChunk> mVoxelChunks;
          
      58   void drawVoxels(  space::Camera& camera );
          };
          
          } /* terrain */
          typedef std::shared_ptr<terrain::Terrain> pTerrain;
          
      64  static pTerrain buildTerrainVoxel(  Engine* engine,  
           pProgram program,  
           const std::string& texturePath,  
           terrain::VoxelConstructor* constructor,  
           GLint radius = 0 ) {
          
           GLfloat voxelGap = 0.2;
          
           pTerrain terrain = pTerrain(  new terrain::Terrain(  radius,   voxelGap ) );
          
           for (  GLint i = 0; i <= radius; i++ ) {
           for (  GLint x = 0; x < 1+2*i; x++ ) {
           for (  GLint z = 0; z < 1+2*i; z++ ) {
           pVoxelChunk chunk = pVoxelChunk(  new terrain::VoxelChunk(  program,  
           engine,  
           texturePath,  
           FILLWAVE_VOXEL_CHUNK_SIZE,  
           constructor,  
           voxelGap ) );
           chunk->moveTo(  glm::vec3(  FILLWAVE_VOXEL_CHUNK_SIZE*voxelGap*x - FILLWAVE_VOXEL_CHUNK_SIZE*voxelGap*(  radius ),  
           0.0,  
           FILLWAVE_VOXEL_CHUNK_SIZE*voxelGap*z - FILLWAVE_VOXEL_CHUNK_SIZE*voxelGap*(  radius ) ) );
           terrain->addChunk(  chunk );
           }
           }
           }
           return terrain;
          
          }
          
          } /* fillwave*/
          
          #endif /* TERRAIN_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/terrain/VoxelChunk.h

       1  /*
           * VoxelChunk.h
           *
           * Created on: Dec 1,   2014
           * Author: Filip Wasil
           */
          
          #ifndef VOXELCHUNK_H_
          #define VOXELCHUNK_H_

           * concepts contained herein are proprietary to Filip Wasil
           * and may be covered by Polish and foreign patents,   patents
           * in process,   and are protected by trade secret or copyright
           * law. Dissemination of this information or reproduction
           * of this material is strictly forbidden unless prior written
           * permission is obtained from Filip Wasil.

          #include <fillwave/terrain/Voxel.h>

          #include <fillwave/models/Reloadable.h>
          
          namespace fillwave {
      38  class Engine;
          namespace terrain {
          
          /*! \class VoxelChunk
           * \brief Block of Voxel objects.
           */
          
      45  class VoxelChunk: public models::Entity,   public models::Reloadable {
          public:
      47   VoxelChunk(  pProgram program,  
           Engine* engine,  
           const std::string& texturePath,  
           GLint size,  
           VoxelConstructor* constructor = nullptr,  
           GLfloat gap = 0.2 );
          
      54   ~VoxelChunk(   );
          
      56   void setType(  GLint type );
          
      58   void reloadVBO(   );
          
      60   void reloadVoxels(  VoxelConstructor* constructor );
          
      62   void draw(  space::Camera& camera );
          
      64   GLint getSize(   );
          
          protected:
      67   const GLfloat mVoxelGap;
          
          private:
      70   GLint mSize;
      71   Voxel*** mVoxels;
      72   pTexture mTexture;
      73   pVertexBufferBasic mVBO;
      74   pProgram mProgram;
      75   manager::LightManager* mLightManager;
          
      77   GLint mUniformLocationCacheModelMatrix,  
           mUniformLocationCacheCameraPosition,  
           mUniformLocationCacheViewProjectionMatrix;
          
      81   void onDraw(   );
          
      83   void coreDraw(   );
          
      85   void initBuffers(   );
          
      87   void initPipeline(   );
          
      89   void initVBO(   );
          
      91   void initVAO(   );
          
      93   void initUniformsCache(   );
          };
          
          
          } /* models */
          typedef std::shared_ptr<terrain::VoxelChunk> pVoxelChunk;
          } /* fillwave*/
          
          #endif /* VOXELCHUNK_H_ */

../inc/fillwave/terrain/VoxelConstructor.h
